meanings.definition: To spell better than someone else.
meanings.sent1: During the spelling bee, Sarah outspelled all her classmates.
meanings.sent2: She always outspelled her brother in spelling tests.
meanings.sent3: The cat outspelled the dog in spelling the word 'meow'.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to outspell others was like a shining beacon of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: Outspelling her opponents became her trademark skill.

meanings.sent1: Tom outspelled his friends in the spelling competition.
meanings.sent2: The young girl outspelled everyone in her class.
meanings.sent3: The robot outspelled the humans in the spelling contest.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for outspelling others was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: Outspelling others gave her a sense of accomplishment.
